show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #86 Morgan Gold "I'm NOT remotely Regenerative!"
subtitle: #86 Morgan Gold "I'm NOT remotely Regenerative!"
summary:
My friend Morgan Gold joins me from the far North of Vermont to share his story of how he got started in agriculture. A common topic of late, we talk about contextually appropriate management and how to define Regenerative Agriculture.
We talk about diversified small farms, how lawns give the illusion of stewardship and most importantly, how to start a farm from scratch and survive!
